Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: jay0211
Reviews.Content: Great price, great service! Free wireless internet, parking and breakfast. Our room has a mini fridge with a freezer, and a microwave which allowed us to buy groceries and save money! We are here for 9 nights, tonight is 3 of 9 and so far we have no complaints. The room is very clean, everyday someone comes in and tidies, replenishes the towels/soap/shampoo and makes our bed while we are out. The staff are friendly. The free breakfast is delicious. I don't know why this hotel only has 2.5 stars....It's nice than some 4 star hotels we've stayed at in the past!

Reviews.Title: “Spacious room... not so clean”
Reviews.Author: autumn a
Reviews.Content: Our room was spacious, but was not clean. I was not expecting much from 2 star accommodations, but I followed other reviewers claims that the rooms were clean- and I was let down. The toilet was dirty. The tub was peeling, the shower handle and head were not clean. The floors had dust balls in the corners and there was dirt under the beds. My sheets had a stain in it. Housekeeping appeared to consist only of making the beds, replacing towels and soap. I was hoping they would have vacuumed or mopped, but I was let down. I did not feel comfortable walking barefoot in the room, and ended up wearing flip flops throughout my stay there. Pros of the accommodations: room was spacious and included fridge and microwave, free breakfast was decent, the location is convenient with plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby, not that far from major attractions. Cons: The room was not clean, could not take breakfast back into the room even though there were very few tables/chairs and many more guests staying at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: comcgin
Reviews.Content: We just came back from a 4 day stay at the Baymont which is actually in Celebration, Florida but the address is Kissimmee. This is a nice hotel with a continental breakfast each day until 9:00 AM. Nothing fancy but a nice breakfast for people on the run. We had a lightbulb out and as soon as I mentioned it, a maintenance person was up to change it. Nice big pool that adults and kids loved. The front desk personnel were very nice and helpful. The one negative about the hotel is some of the guests are very rude in leaving their dirty breakfast plates and cups on the tables and just get up and leave a mess. It doesn't get cleaned up right away and is a bit unpleasant to other guests. We, along with some other guests did complain but since they said they were understaffed, it took a while before the tables were cleaned. Other than that, it was a great stay. We will definitely return to the Baymont again and again. Thanks staff!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Mommabearof4
Reviews.Content: To start , the good things, cost . If your on a budget a strict budget this hotel will be sufficant . The breakfast offered is cheap basic , cearal muffins or waffles. Nothing fancy. The staff was very friendly even lettIng us check in a few hours early. Which was nice after driving 1200 miles. The pool was not heated and needed a vaccuum ran through it be cause of the trees surrounding it. The holet needs some updating . The paint, lighting , carpets and mattresses. The hotel is off the road a but not really visible . I am usually not a complainer but be warned there is a night club Right behind the hotel , so if your room is on the backside which ours was . It will be a party till about 4 am! The area didn't look like a place I would walk alone at night . I probably wouldn't walk with a group either. Okay the rooms lighting was low , guess it keeps you from seeing to much. The toilet in my room stopped up 2 days in row , staff was pretty quick with the response. Our 2nd room had a toilet leaking into the floor, it was fixed into day 3 after more phone calls . The hotel is close to shopping like food and random bring home dust collections. Not really close to attractions , about 20 mins from all and we visited them all.

Reviews.Title: “not too bad for price”
Reviews.Author: TOtalker
Reviews.Content: three adults and one child stayed march 20th -28th. first impressions are not too much. area around hotel looks a bit dodgy and room stank of cigarettes (we did get a smoking room!) rooms were clean, if a bit old looking. beds not too bad, no evidence of bed bugs found. some sand on floor of bathroom. breakfast minimal, coffee, tea, oj, apple juice , waffles and mini donuts and bagels, bread (no toaster), some fruit. coffee was decent though! Pool was exceptionally cold, kids didn't seem to mind. some kid's were yelled at for jumping into the pool- they were told they would be kicked out if they continued to "dive" which they wer NOT doing! this was done by the same crabby staff that advised us we would be charged 10$ if we brought food back to our room from the breakfast bar- she then pointed to a little sign on the wall that advised you are not allowed to bring food to your room. (which we had done the previous 5 days we were there) luckily they did not charge us! great location- close to parks, food, entertainment. one issue with location though- airport close by and flight path directly over hotel so don't expect to sleep in any days!! Very loud!! our room was backing on to a bowling alley which was very noisy on Friday and saturday nights-live band in the bar and all the drunks coming out at 2 am. All in all- got what I expected from a two star hotel. would likely look for something different on next trip though, but not too bad considering the price

Reviews.Title: “Another cracking stay at The Baymont.”
Reviews.Author: barriepickett
Reviews.Content: I have just had another two weeks at The Baymont, Kissimmee, and enjoyed it very much, in fact even more than the two previous visits. My room was excellent, as always. The service was very friendly, efficient, with any request sorted efficiently. I look forward to returning next year, and my hotel will be The Baymont. Kamal and Amanda Faizi run an excellent ship, with equally excellent staff.

Reviews.Title: “A nice average hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mike_UKY
Reviews.Content: We have stayed there a few times. When we are leaving from vacation it is a good night's sleep on comfortable beds. In our opinion - The price is great for the accomodations

Reviews.Title: “Trip advisor let me down on this one”
Reviews.Author: jalflem
Reviews.Content: The Cons out weighed the pros for me. For me it this hotel is too far east of I-4 for me. A Lot of empty buildings around this property. When we drove up to this property we immediately got a bad feeling about. The room was very badly needing painting, there was black mold around the front of the tub. The beds where not good either. I pulled the sheets back as i always do to have a look, and one bed looked fairly new, but appeared to be very low quality. The other one was old and stained. The price for the room was really good, but if i had to do it again i would have paid a little more, stayed somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: anarkali538
Reviews.Content: Best friendly, clean, welcoming hotel in the region. Managers and all staff very friendly, efficient and extremely helpful in giving all sorts of information whether about parks, restaurants,shopping or geographical locations. After a great and varied breakfast, ranging from cereals to waffles. toast to muffins,fruit, tea,coffee and juices every morning, I would relax by the well maintained pool in the sun, even managed to swim in it even though it was February. Definitely ideal for families as it is close to Disney and there is so much space for children to run around the surrounding area. Most people also enjoy the beautiful flowers and shrubs which show the pride the owners take in this property. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and plan to go back as soon as possible, if not this year again then next year without a doubt, especially as the spacious rooms are well equipped with TV, microwave, coffee maker etc. and very affordable. The lakes around Kissimmee are amazing, as is downtown K. The only downside is that public transport is not very efficient, I would have loved to hop on a bus for some shorter trips instead of sitting in a car.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for ! This is a VALUE....”
Reviews.Author: Frapper007
Reviews.Content: This is not a 4 or 5 star hotel. It is a 2 0r 3 star hotel. And we found the accomodations quite acceptable. Check in went smoothly and very friendly. Room was clean and comfortable. Daily cleaning was timely and done well. The breakfast was the only problem, I can handle and understand it being crowded. What I can not accept is a RUDE and MEAN Spirited woman working there. There were 3 different women and 2 0f 3 were very nice. The third woman stay out of her way !!! To the Hotel owner: I would not let her near any of my guests. She was working on the morning of Thursday the 15th of March.

Reviews.Title: “A home away from home”
Reviews.Author: sailingfourfun
Reviews.Content: Affordable, clean, and clean! This is our second time staying at this location, we also stayed here for a week last march. Can't say enough about the staff and the pride they take in their jobs! The owners living on-site, and being very hands on, makes this hotel feel like a home away from home. This was an ideal location for a home base in Florida; this year we spent some of our time at the beach (Atlantic and Gulf coast, each are an hour drive), and still able to spend a few hours at the end of the day going to the amusement parks, or Downtown Disney. There's a large chain fitness gym 2 blocks away in the mall that has day or week memberships. This Baymont is 20 min from all the Orlando attractions, 2 min from Walmart/Target, etc. With the in-suite kitchenette (upper and lower cupboards, sink, fridge, etc) and a local grocery store a block away you can't ask for much more. The free breakfast has several kinds of cereal (suited for both kids and adults), toast, bagels, 2 jumbo waffle makers, etc. and lots of seating. Can't say enough about the GREAT staff! We'll be back next year! Book early they were sold out during both our stays.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: 4Traveljunkies_99
Reviews.Content: Clean. comfortable. safe. Close to disney. Can't beat the price if purchased on hotwire. Was nervous after "winning" this on hotwire and then seeing reviews by others but pleasantly surprised. Staff was nice. Breakfast filling (we brought our own fruit). Room newly remodeled, very spacious and comfortable. Request a kidsuite if you can-my kids thought it was the best. enjoyed our stay for the time we were actually in the room.

Reviews.Title: “*sigh*”
Reviews.Author: nsgrimm
Reviews.Content: We stayed here a few weeks ago. I wasn't expecting much considering what we payed, however I felt very unsafe. We were put on the backside of the hotel and it was very creepy back there, barely any lighting and it backs to a bowling ally which has people signing until way late into the night/early morning. I got the feeling that there were people who live in this hotel seasonally which was a little odd. The breakfast area was awful. After the first morning, we didn't even eat the free breakfast because it's so crowded in the room that you can't even move. The rooms were so-so the pictures you see with the flat screen tv's are only in the suites so don't be fooled. We usually leave tips for housekeeping hoping they will do a little something extra for our kids (ie. towel animals, pose their stuffed animals, etc). We left a tip all 3 mornings we were there and nothing but the bare essentials they had to do were done, disappointing. The bathrooms in the rooms need to be renovated, I wouldn't even let my children take a bath in them. The outside of the hotel was very dirty with cobwebs and dead bugs everywhere. I wasn't impressed at all with this hotel and doubt I will stay here again. Again, for $50 a night I didn't expect the Hilton but sheesh! On a positive note though, the staff were very friendly and tried to accommodate as much as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Stopped by again this year............”
Reviews.Author: Impala guy
Reviews.Content: Stayed here earlier this month and found everything about the same. There is good value here (nothing fancy) and the room we stayed in was neat and clean. You have to keep everything in perspective here---the prices are kept on the value side of all locations in the Orlando area. The breakfast was adequate to get you going for the day and off we went. They must be doing something right, because the place was quite full of vacationers going to the resorts. We will return next year, too.

Reviews.Title: “Good for the money”
Reviews.Author: LWtravels20590
Reviews.Content: Spent two nights here in Feb. The room was nice - spacious and clean - but the staff forgot to turn on the phone until late the 2nd night. Also found a roach near the door but this is Florida. The staff was very nice. The cleaning staff only left 1 coffee pack which was insufficient for my family in the morning. When I called the front desk, there was only 1 person so it took a long time. He had coffee packs but since he was the only person on duty, I had to go get it - it was late and I was tired. There was no playground for children or kiddy pool. Internet was expensive although there was free wi-fi. I didn't want to carry a computer for a short trip but in retrospect I should have. Breakfast was okay but during peak times seating was at a premium. However, I was impressed that they had decaffinated tea bags. The free shuttle was useless. Doesn't leave for Magic Kingdom until 11 am. Epcot departs at 8:50 but only returns at 9:45 pm. Universal studio and Sea World shuttle times are a little bit better. While it was very convenient to drive to Disney, parking is $14 a day which I wasn't expecting to pay. Most of the near by restaurants seemed to be chain restaurants. Close to drug store for items I forgot. Virginia Traveler

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: icefisher330
Reviews.Content: This place is fine if you want to have sheets so thin that you can read the newspaper through them while you try to determine the origin of the stains on the sheets. The staff is mainly incompetent and un-caring. This place is old and the maintenance program is non-existent. The cleaning staff is marginal at best and they should instruct the woman that does the sub-par breakfast that she should not clean the waffle machine with her fingers or blow the crumbs from the machine with her breath!

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly Average”
Reviews.Author: gators5
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night on a short trip to Disney. PROS: cost/ breakfast included/ clean kitchenette/ rollaways available to fit family of 5/ quiet room in back/ location--close to shopping and restaurants CONS: beds feel "springy"/ hard pillows/ moldy caulking around bath/ safety issue--outside light flickering at top of stairs/ had to call 3 times to get rollaway bed/2 vacant restaurants in front of hotel make it seem a little seedy at night/ breakfast was all bread--waffles,toast, muffins, cereal TIPS: If you really want a room here, make a reservation---while I was checking in at the front desk, 3 people came looking for last-minute rooms that were unavailable. If you are a total neat freak, don't stay.

Reviews.Title: “Not good customer service”
Reviews.Author: Tdubb21
Reviews.Content: We had a problem with the Internet which is the only reason we get a hotel and they didn't do anything to fix the problem or accomendate our stay. Will not be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, close to DisneyWorld”
Reviews.Author: Challenger07
Reviews.Content: This is a good low cost choice for a hotel close to DisneyWorld. We stayed 4 days and including taxes it was under $200. Given this price point the size and quality of the rooms was good, they are a bit dated and the beds are not the same comfort as you'd get at a Hampton Inn or similar but they were fine and clean. The only slip up was the maid replaced the coffee filter I used, but didn't clean up the old cups, or throw away the coffer left in the jug. Breakfast is continental meaning no eggs or meat but a selection of cereals, breads and a hot waffel machine. I found the front desk staff very pleasant and helpful with information on the local area. The hotel has a small outdoor swimming pool this isn't heated. There is walmart half a mile away with a nice food section, now that Disney allows you to take food in it was a good location to get food for the day.

Reviews.Title: “One of the better Hotels I have stayed at”
Reviews.Author: Rick B B
Reviews.Content: This is a two star $ rated economical hotel ie not a 5 star high class hotel. With that said, I rated this hotel 5 stars within the $ economical hotel class. I found this hotel much cleaner and better maintained then the majority of 2 star $ cost rated hotels that my wife and I generally stay in. We found the staff very friendly and helpful. The desk staff even looked up the GPS coordinates to plug into a GPS for a couple from Spain. In researching this hotel, I thought a number of complaints were not justified, ie. they were expecting a 4 or 5 star class hotel for a two star class cost. I had the pleasure of talking with the Operations Director, Kamal Faizi who is personable and pleasant to talk with. I agree with him that his hotel evidently gets confused with the Baymont in the same area, the "Celebration area" near Rt 192 and I-4. The internet Wireless was very good, the room included a free use room safe. The breakfast provided is not top of the line, but is much better then what I serve myself at home. We heard some light street and neighboring room noise, much less then other 2 star $ rated hotels. I will be keeping a record of this hotel for the next time we come to Orlando to get Mickey's autograph :-).

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: 25softballmom25
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here with 4 other families from our softball team. With the rate we received (41 per night average) I was a bit skeptical about what we would be walking into. However, I was pleasantly surprised. The rooms were clean. There was a nice area with cabinets and a microwave and a refrigerator. The lobby was clean and welcoming. Breakfast choices were sparse but they did a good job of keeping the area stocked and clean. We were about 7 or 8 miles from Disney and about the same from the other park in which we were playing. There is a Red Lobster, Bravo Supermarket, Italian restaurant and gift shops within walking distance and within a short drive you will find everything you need/want. The weather was cold while we were there so we did not use the pool and there is no hot tub. The pool looked nice and I liked the wooden tables around the pool area. The only complaints I have about the room is when we arrived there was no Kleenex or toilet paper, no plastic bag for the ice bucket and only 3 towels for 4 people. I sent the girls to the front desk and they quickly brought the items to our room. In the morning when I went to make coffee there was no regular coffee or coffee cups. I left a note for housekeeping and those items were left for us.

Reviews.Title: “I think you can find better...”
Reviews.Author: alienpilot
Reviews.Content: Got a room with a "kitchenette". I was expecting a full size refrigerator with a kitchen area, but there was only an extra kitchen sink with a small work area with a micro above it and no dishwasher. The refrigerator was your standard mini frige. Beds were cheap, but fairly comfortable in keeping with a two star rating. Rugs were clean and in good repair. You can tell the rooms older, but it looks like they have kept up maintenance. What was disturbing was that I had a few maintenance concerns in the room; 1) the rubber stopper for the kitchen sink was missing and I needed to wash dishes and pans. 2) the bathroom sink drained very slowly. And 3) the coffeemaker didn't brew. I brought these concerns to management on the way out to our activity. That evening, only the coffemaker was replaced...but no coffee packets. Had to go to the front desk to get them. The surrounding area is a bit on the creepy side. Definitely a 2 - 1.5 star property. If you're just looking for somewhere to crash, this could be it. Only reason I booked this was that I got a tremendous deal on Priceline "Name Your Own Price" and was the closest map circle to where I was going to go. Looking at some surrounding hotels, there is better around in the same price class...

Reviews.Title: “Do Not let your First impression cloud your experience”
Reviews.Author: disbarbabe
Reviews.Content: I always use Priceline and use the "name your own price". To my surprise, I put in my amount and clicked on 2 stars. I read most of the reviews. I am a local. I am a Caregiver, 24/7. I Live where I work. So, for my special "time" away, I was Wonderfully surprised!!! Knowing the area, any outta-towner would be taken aback. NO!!!...the Hotel is "spot-on"! It exceeded my expectations. The rooms are so very clean. Great surprise was the mini kitchen. And with my past experiences...it was roach free. The rooms are immaculate! Beds were comfy. Allow your first impression be the owners/front desk personnel. I credit the cleanliness of the room to the young lady, Michelle, who cleaned my room, she was extremely accommodating. They could not be more kind and passionate about their hotel, and with due reason! The Baymont in Kissimmee, is a 3 star (not the 2 they were given, SO wrong)...don't underestimate this wonderful place. And for outta-towners, is just minutes to all of the attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Stay”
Reviews.Author: clserranoc
Reviews.Content: Baymont is a decent place to stay if you're going to the parks in Orlando. It's clean and the staff is very nice. The continental breakfast is not very abundant and it gets very crowded in the morning, but it's ok. We chose to have breakfast outside the hotel. It's about 15 minutes away from Disney if there's not too much traffic. It's well located, clean (which is very important for us), and the rooms are not too small.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, nicest hotel in Kissimmee!!”
Reviews.Author: Marcel25joyfull
Reviews.Content: I made a reservation at the Baymont because most of their reviews on this website are positive so we decided to give it a try. Front desk staff was courteous and answered all our questions, room was nice, clean and comfortable, beds were nicely made it remained me of a Marriot that I had stayed in the past. Continental breakfast is a LOT more than a regular continental breakfast we made our own waffles!. We stayed for 4 nights and our stay at this hotel was perfect, we were at the parks most of the day and every day when we came back to our room it was perfectly clean and made. I want to thank the staff and owners for making our stay more than enjoyable and we will see you again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely property”
Reviews.Author: chutchi
Reviews.Content: We were in Orlando for a conference and got the room via expedia. For the price, it was a very good value! The grounds were lovely and the staff was very responsive. We had some trouble (more than once) with the refrigerator in the room and the keys to the doors. The finally replaced the refrigerator and got the key issue worked out. In order to accomodate our trouble, they waived the daily resort fee for us. I would recommend this hotel - I think our experience was a "one off" kind of thing.

Reviews.Title: “A great stay!”
Reviews.Author: eve_1081
Reviews.Content: Big, clean and comfortable rooms. The management/staff is very friendly and helpful. A great free breakfast with fresh waffles and a nice pool. I would definetely go back!

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel ever!”
Reviews.Author: paulwell
Reviews.Content: Directly next to universal, disney and outlets, great value for money. friendly staff and lovely breakfast with frrsh waffles every morning.

Reviews.Title: “My 3rd stay in this hotel, quality goes down”
Reviews.Author: Skopik
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel twice in recent years, always had been very satisfied. Not any more. I am not sure if the management has changed but the service quality dropped, the cleanliness is very bad now... When booked the hotel, I have personaly contacted hotel by mail with request to get room in top floor,facing to the pool. Upon arrival, a night clerk give me room in ground floor, despite the fact it was obvious that there is a lot free rooms. I asked again for 3rd floor, I god a key for 2nd floor.. ??? OK, it was 2 AM, after journey from Miami I had no mood for any more discusion. Once comming to the room, we realized that this is in the back of the hotel, facing to a night club. In 2 AM there was a loud music that would not allow you sleep correctly. So I get back to reception, asking for another room (I see that room I want is free becouse curtains was off). Once gettting this room, when we came to the room, we realized that room was not cleaned, there was food on the table, wet towels, dirty toilet. So, AGAIN, I had to go to reception to get another (fourth.. ) room. Once I claimed the issue with 3rd room, we got a final room - again in 2nd floor instad of requested 3rd floor - there was a lot free rooms in 3rd floor.. JUST TERRIBLE!!! In the room, it was obvious that it was quickly cleaned, but still I would not say it was really clean. Finaly, we stayed in this hotel for 3 nights and then left to another place. Summary - you will not die in this hotel, in general you will recieve an average service, but nothing more. They had been far better. Just a note - when I checked in, I saw a screensawer of computer in reception - saying - "we´re number 29 in Orlando, lets be number one" - guys.. sincerly.. If you will not improve your services, you will never be there..

Reviews.Title: “Nice recently updated hotel at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Brawnylad
Reviews.Content: Comfortable rooms includes breakfast and the ability to charge my electric car.

Reviews.Title: “Probably one of the worst places I have ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: juicecan
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of traveling and this ranks up there as one of the worst places I have ever stayed. The first room they sent me to was not even cleaned from the previous occupants. Got another room that was clean and no bugs but that was the best thing about this place. If you are looking for a bargain, then perhaps this might be the place for you but if I had not pre-paid for this place I would have walked to another place. Everything appears to be be cracked, falling down, in need of paint, etc. etc..

Reviews.Title: “NOT a Hotwire 3 Star-- Not as bad as many reviews”
Reviews.Author: martythompson
Reviews.Content: Do not confuse this place with the Baymont that is way to the east on the same road. Can't comment on that one other than everything nearby seems to be boarded up (including my favoritre Sonny's BBQ Place The good-- WOW the lobby is one of the nicest spaces I have every seen-- The furniture in the guest room was great. Huge flat screen TV. Great working area in the room Super Comfy bed The pool was large and empty--- must be fall! The Bad- Really-- how expensive is a can of paint. I know the heavy humidity and searing sun really make exterior painted surfaces look bad--- but they look extra bad here. Dirty-- very dirty and bad house keeping. My son dropped a chip in the living area. It remained there during our entire stay.--- It is almost like this place operates on 2 different budgets. The "Suits" have given them all the best stuff. The local management is either inept or does not have the funds to do day to day care. Our experience: We arrived a couple hours early and they offered to upgrade us to a "Kid Suite"-- cool The kid Suite is a "home made" partition that has a bunk and a small single bed in a "pen" that has been sectioned off in a regular room. Not a bad idea-- the kids have their own TV-- but the cheap execution is not attractive--- The KId TV remote had no batteries and the cable channels have recently changed--- there were Channels I would rather my kid not have access to. They will hit you up for a timeshare deal when you get your "parking pass" but it is not obnoxious. Breakfast was a decent spread for a European-- lacking for American tastes. (but dang, the area is really pretty) overall--- the reviews here seem a bit harsh. Once you are in your room things are fine. For breakfast think a step or 2 below the Holiday Inn Express. The TV, sink and fridge/microwave areas are top notch. They just really need to get new management that understands how to use an Orek and a paintbrush

Reviews.Title: “Not what I had expected”
Reviews.Author: Oldfitzman
Reviews.Content: Very hard to find, located behind other business's which were no longer in operation. Room was not very clean (dust on some furniture dirt in corners) Bathtub hand rail very loose. Our room was in the rear of the hotel just in front of a bowling ally somewhat noisy late at night and early morning. Free breakfast was better than average

Reviews.Title: “Coming back for sure :)”
Reviews.Author: Katleen86
Reviews.Content: I don't know why some people are giving bad reviews, then again we all have different views & opinions! The place is well maintained, clean rooms not to mention a small fridge and microwave plus seperate sink! Breakfast was good, consisted of fruit, waffles(waffle maker which not many hotels have), bread,4 cereals, milk, juice & coffee! Staff was nice I mean we forgot toothpaste and they happily gave us some colgate packets no charge! Only thing two things I saw wrong, you have to keep an eye out for it they don't have a bright sign like others, and in front of hotel 3 out of the 4 restaurants went our of business it makes the surroundings of hotel abandoned, but its not the owners fault! Overall I payed $106 for two nights in a room with two queen beds I will definately come back! Thank you for such a pleasant stay!

Reviews.Title: “amazingly surprised..”
Reviews.Author: MAgIc_RAF
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I started our trip in Florida at the Baymont.. We were quite suprised with our room as it was quite large, nice kitchenette, and most important.. The Kingbed we requested was real ! perfect.. Now that we finished our trip in Florida, I can only say : Baymont Inn was the best hotel we stayed... The staff was friendly, especially the owners !! Really nice , and helping us to get the most of our stay. Would definetely go back.. We've stayed in about 8 hotels in 2 weeks in Florida and our best deal must have been the Baymont Inn.. Comparing with other hotels in West Florida/Keys/Miami.. I can only say that they do deserve more than 2.5*.... Should be 3.5*!! ;)

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Patricia P
Reviews.Content: Was pleasantly surprised when we arrived. It is a shame that you can barely see it from the highway as it is a beautiful front area especially at night. The room was more than we expected. The staff was so accommodating. Our every need was met. We have been going to Florida for the last 40 years for our vacations and for a reasonable price hotel this was one of the best places we have ever stayed. After all my husband and I do not need the Luxury hotels with their high prices. We do not want to buy it, we just want a clean, comfortable safe place to stay and this hotel fits the bill completely.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: gwendoline78
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Orlando and the theme parks. It is only a few minutes drive to the parks and the world famous outlet malls. The hotel has a pleasant atmosphere and is very well kept. The room was clean, spacious and confortable. It was nice to unwind in the pool area after a long day at the parks. The owners and staff are very friendly and efficient. They gave us great tips about eating out, shopping and activities. There is a AMF bowling right behind the hotel where you can have drinks and play until 12:00.

Reviews.Title: “back again”
Reviews.Author: queenie1000
Reviews.Content: We visited this again after been here in 2010 too. Great location with easy acces to everything. Nice area with lots of shops and restaurants. Rooms are quiet, big and a free breakfast in the morning with wafels you can make yourself.

Reviews.Title: “helpful staff and great customer service”
Reviews.Author: yelena a
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an inexpensive hotel with friendly and accommodating staff, this is the place. No, its not a luxury hotel but that's OK. they treat you like royalty1 from the moment you arrive you fee as if you are the only guest that matters. The focus customer service is evident and the hotel staff really does everything they can to make you feel "at home." It was nice meeting the owner and his wife, they were both very helpful and when i had a special request they immediately responded and provided me with everything i needed. I highly recommend this hotel if you are in the greater Orlando/Kissimmee area and need a place to stay. Helpful hint: USE THE POOL! its great for families

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price.”
Reviews.Author: szetka
Reviews.Content: When my friend said they had booked in Kissimmee I was leery due to the area. This is not in the best part of town, but the managers have done pretty well with what they have. Pros: Staff friendly, place kept clean, pool Cons: Really need to upgrade towels, bedspreads, etc. Dicey surroundings.

Reviews.Title: “Personal service, caring staff and an overall fantastic experiance.”
Reviews.Author: marcos a
Reviews.Content: Every year I bring a group of twenty to stay at this hotel. The owner, general manager and their staff always work hard to make sure our stay is comfortable and all our needs are met. The owner is incredibly professional and he understands what it takes to achieve superior service. Every time we stay here the owner and general manager make sure to fulfill every reasonable request and they go above and beyond expectations. A hotel "star" rating is not a good indicator of what to expect. If you stay at this hotel you should expect the following 1. superior and personal service 2. clean and comfortable rooms 3. staff that is properly trained and fully competent 4. An overall excellent experience. The facilities,including fitness center and laundry area are always kept clean, illuminated and safe. Free breakfast in the morning is a great way to start the day. The food was always fresh and delicious. I strongly recommend this hotel because of the management team and the way they run the hotel. They clearly understand how to keep the customer happy and that is crucial when operating business.

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe any of the good reviews!!!!”
Reviews.Author: slim4wilcz
Reviews.Content: Thid hotel is anything but nice. The towels are thread bare if you can get any. We had 5 in our room and reserved for that many but found 2 bath towels, l washcloth and no soap. We asked for more, but they never came, had to go to the desk to get them. The remote did not work, nor did the refrigerator. We reported both, but the remote never was repaired. The grounds are very unkempt, with garbage and debris scattered everywhere. The pool was closed early because they did not want the baseball players that were staying there to use it, as we were told by the desk clerk. Breakfast consisted of bread, waffles, and stale muffins. No fruit, no anything else. The kicker was that you could not take any food from the breakfast room, not even a cup of coffee, or be charged an extra $10!!!! I never heard of such a thing. One more thing - the hotel is located in a very rundown area - I felt like I was in the ghetto. Good thing we spent very little time there. Never going back or to any other Baymont.

Reviews.Title: “I will definetly be back !!!”
Reviews.Author: jsmly
Reviews.Content: This place lived up to the great reviews i read before booking it for a week. The room was very clean (including the carpets...my socks did not get dirty from walking on the carpet) I loved the kitchenette, microwave and mini fridge and especially the seperate sink ( i hate having to clean my cups in the bathroom sink) they even have cabinets to put our food items in. :) The beds were comfy, they had nice comfy IKEA comforters. The staff was also very friendly and it was nice and quiet at night. My son enjoyed the pool and every morning was excited about going down for breakfast. and all for a reasonable price. It is also only about 15 minutes from Disney . Needless to say I loved it !!!

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we'll be back soon!!”
Reviews.Author: kazamo
Reviews.Content: I stayed @ this place room #229 almost a week with my wife and 2 kids and we had a great time in florida. The room was very clean and smelled good (wtihout pet smell,no carpet stain smell and no smoke smell), Beds and Pillows were very comfortable its the first time in hotel i was able to fall sleep faster and got full sleep also woke up every morning without neck pain,and soarness. room had a kitchenette with microwave and fridge which was great. Staff was very friendly polite,professional and family oriented. Only one night we couldn't fall asleep faster as we wanted, because of laoud,carefree & excited bunch of new guests, talking outside in parking, well when we couldn't take it, we called in front desk they responded qucikly and they cast away all the noise. we really enjoyed complimentary breakfast in the morning was awesome all you can eat and make your own instant fresh waffles was a great idea, after two days i was gettin' up early just for the instant waffles. We found this place tripadvisor.com and read the most of the reviews and then we just walked-in,checked-in and checked-out for very reasonable rate better than some online rates simple is that. Also great Amenities & Services that i experianced such as Free High Speed Internet,Outdoor Pool,Cable/HBO,Fitness Center,Free Enhanced Breakfast. We loved it and an excellent location around 15 mins with traffic from disney parks, if i was to buy a house in florida i want to be this close to the disney parks. We went see such as the magic kingdom, animal kingdom, epcot center,and hollywood studios and other parks all these parks 15 mins away from the Baymount Inn location and if you interest in dinner and shows like Arabian nights, Medieval Times and many more its few minutes away by vehical or if you like to walk and explore the place then it place that i will reccommend to all. We really enjoyed our trip to disney in florida as we all needed to get away from everydays routin life and this Baymont Inn, it's location, friendly staff's hospitality,it's amenities and services are great assetts to Kissimmee Florida..

Reviews.Title: “highly overrated”
Reviews.Author: caritomdq
Reviews.Content: this is just and average old hotel.i booked it bc i did have high expectations due to all the positive reviews in TA. This hotel is not that clean, not that well located (still half an hour into magic kingdom with light traffic) room was ok, sheets and carpet looked old.there were some small insects too. the entrance is a bit complicated and it lacks of light or indications. we drove by a couple of times at night till we found out were the entrance was. breakfast was average: coffe, milk, cereals, minibagels and a waffle maker,recommend showing up early as items are not replaced. wifi worked properly in the room. last year i stayed in a 40 usd motel with better breakfast, rooms and location. altough the front desk lady was indeed very polite, i wouldnt go back since there are better options for the price. (i paid us$ 54 a night)

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: smf_24
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Baymont Inn & Suites a couple of times, and most recently last week, and always found it to be excellent value for money. The rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious; plus they have a mini kitchenette with a fridge and microwave which is a real bonus. The pool is kept very clean and there is a good breakfast. The staff are very friendly, courteous and helpful and we look forward to returning when we next visit Kissimmee. All in all - a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: lparmenter
Reviews.Content: We booked a package vacation through Southwest airlines. When we arrived in Florida we went to check in at the Howard Johnsons Tropical Palms and the place was a dump. Across the street was the Baymont Inn which we stayed in a couple years back . There was no way we were gong to stay at the Howard Johnsons. Baymont Inn desk clerk was so pleasant compared to the staff at HJ's. She let us check into the room right away even though it was only 1130 in the morning. She advised us on how to go about getting our money back. She was a pleasure to deal with. Baymont's rooms are clean, have refrigerators and microwaves, a nice pool area, great breakfast and lobby area. Good deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: “second stay and was better than ever”
Reviews.Author: anam8545
Reviews.Content: I stayed last year with friends and we stayed again this year. Loved the room - clean and roomy and it was so handy, four of us easily had a great nights sleep. Breakfast was excellent and we also really enjoyed the coffee in the room and 4 HBO channels.TV was really good. Staff were so helpful and full of idea. We went to downtown Kissimmee and hung out at some really cool spots. The staff told us about some really nice hidden gems. The only place to stay in Kissimmee! Thanks again. Will be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “My family loved this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: goody055
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my wife and kids and we had a great time. The room was so clean, it had a kitchenette with microwave and fridge which was great as we have small children. The grounds and surrounds were nice and it's great that it's set back from the road as you dont hear the traffic. They provided us with a free breakfast which is great before heading out to the parks. The pool is great. Best of all is the staff, they are so nice and go out of their way to be helpful. Will definately be back next year! thanks Baymont staff!

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs”
Reviews.Author: cbp23
Reviews.Content: Very different from the pictures you see on the internet. The stairs leading to the second floor were dirty with spiderwebs, found bed bugs three times. Asked to remove the spiders from outside the room...still waiting. The front lady was having a bad day..not even a good morning. The only nice thing I have to say was the lady who was on top of the breakfast area making sure everything was clean and stock...... Will not recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Better Than Most for the Price”
Reviews.Author: jimw4881
Reviews.Content: What a pleasant surprise. We go to Kissimmee at least twice a year and usually for three or four days but have never stayed at the Baymont Inn. I play golf all day and the Mrs. plays flea market endurance level 2. The Baymont is priced right, clean, very friendly staff and close to all the attractions. They have a typical "continental" breakfast but do offer waffles! The pool is clean and well kept and the surrounding arears make it a nice place to stay. A little tricky to enter and leave the ample parking area but a when all is said and done a minor inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Room, Great Location, Friendly People!”
Reviews.Author: TRGoldman
Reviews.Content: Just checked out from the motel, i highly recommend! everything is perfect: good price, friendly staff, big and comfortable room, and 20 min from the big theme parks! (we went to universal - took us 21min!) The only bad thing is the fitness center, it's really small and besides 2 aerobic machines they don't have anything, cause the weight machines wasn't working :( but besides it it was all great 4.5 stars from me! The staff was great - Greg J was really helpful and nice, like everybody in there! The pool is cool in front of the hotel, and the breakfast is just what you want to see when you wake up.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: guy60
Reviews.Content: I visited this hotel last year with my family and I said I'd be back - well I was, and it was as excellent this time as it was before. This time a came alone, for a relaxing trip - some theme parks, sunbathing and quite a bit of shopping. The owner and his staff were very helpful and friendly - that's on the front desk, giving tips and advice on where and when to visit the parks and shops, and housekeeping, which was friendly and efficient. The owner and his family live on site and this creates a welcoming, family feel to the hotel. So much so that I'll be back again with my family later this year!

Reviews.Title: “A welcoming, friendly hotel, with very good accomodation.”
Reviews.Author: barriepickett
Reviews.Content: I have now stayed at the Baymont twice, last September, and May 2nd to 16th this year. I returned to the Baymont because the accomodation is very good indeed, offering good roooms, good beds, also amenities for storage, with microwave, tea/coffee ,making. The rooms are well maintained with friendly housekeeping staff. A breakfast room provides cereals, waffles, bread for toasting, with, of course, tea or coffee and fruit juice, and small cakes, so no one goes out for the day hungry. Mr Faizi, general manager and his wife are very nice people who will put any problems right very quickly, however small. The only problem I experienced was the previous room occupant had shut the safe, which is code controlled, but very quickly sorted. The pool is very good and safe for children. I look forward to returning to Kissimmee with the Baymont as my base.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely quiet place with extremely accommodating and helpful staff team”
Reviews.Author: Newman051
Reviews.Content: From the day we arrived, hungry with baby in toe, we received the most amazing treatment. Help and tips with getting around, best shopping, best food etc etc. We was provided with the best room to accommodate the baby. Because the hotel is off the road it was nice and quiet.Our room was clean, spacious and overlooked the pool. All the staff we encountered were friendly, full of advice and care that we had all we needed.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for a family on a budget.”
Reviews.Author: FloridaFamily32433
Reviews.Content: My family and i traveled down to kissimee from northwest florida for a week long getaway to visit disney and universal. We booked the baymont through priceline and paid 355$ for 7 nights, being that we have a 2 year old and 5 year old we have to travel on a budget so I thought this was a great price. The Baymont is a older motel, located on the far end of 192 around the 15 mile marker, your looking at about a 10-20 minute drive to disney depending on red lights and traffic, but we didnt mind the drive cause this gave you options of places to eat and shop, and believe me there are plenty of choices. There is a super walmart, about 2 blocks away from the motel and a super target not too much farther. The motel was fairly nice and quiet, the front desk clerk on check inn seemed like she was having a bad night, but other than that check in only took a minute or two. The motel offers a free contenital breakfast that ends at 10, has the standard cereal,muffins donuts fruits belgian waffle maker orange and apple juice.The beds were semi-comfortable, but the pillows were horrible, but a quick trip to the walmart fixed that. The bathroom was clean, as well as the beds. The rooms come with a fridge,microwave,sink, and coffee maker. My daughters and I did take advantage of the pool after long days in the park. House keeping was excellent, we come home everyday to fresh towels and they even took the time to straighten up our daughters playpen and fold her blankets and cover up her little baby doll. One night we did come in and we were short a blanket, but went down to the front desk and they had it fixed within a couple of minutes. all in all we had a wonderful stay. I only have a few minor gripes, and few reccomendations..1) Get some mosquito control around the swimming pool, i know this is florida and we have mosquitos, but them things were flying hypedermic needles. 2.) Its not mentioned but theres appearently a small airport behind the hotel somewhere, you hear the planes outside, but while in the room I never noticed them. 3) When exiting the motel its one way so you have to go down and bang a u turn at the light, which can take a bit if the traffic is bad, so there are some parking lots you can miander through, desserted resteraunt,bravo supermarket, then the days inn and it brings you out at the light 4) not all the rooms have big flat screens as mentioned in the description, this is appearently limited to the suits, but the rooms have a large box style TV. ... so hopefully this is helpful. Check out went really smooth and I have no major complaints. My family would deff. consider staying at the baymont again.

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean, quality hotel for a great price! Wonderful staff!”
Reviews.Author: Hoss0317
Reviews.Content: Mr. Faizi, Thanks so much for your hospitality!! My wife and I had a wonderful time this weekend. She wanted to go shopping for her 45th birthday, so what better place to shop than Kissimmee, Florida? Your hotel has always been a GREAT PLACE to stay when we travel down there! The best thing about your hotel is that we get a good quality room for such a great price (sounds like a commercial :); the no hassle stay; and most of all you are PET FRIENDLY!! My wife appreciates the amenities that your hotel offers, i.e. kitchenette with coffee pot, refrigerator, microwave, and lets not forget the iron! Again thanks, and tell your staff what a great job they are doing, it makes for a wonderful stay! Looking forward to traveling back your way soon!

Reviews.Title: “excellent accomodation”
Reviews.Author: omegaglas
Reviews.Content: As a family this is our seventh visit to Orlando in five years and this is the best accomodation that we have stayed in so far. The rooms are quiet something you will not get on I drive or backing on to the I4. The breakfast is the best and offers the most choice, most places offer a cup of orange juice and a bagel or muffin whereas Baymont offers a much wider selection. In most of the motel type accomodation the rooms are not at a European standard, I would say that the Baymont is. It is nearby to Disney and it an ideal touring base for further afield. The pool is good but as we were there early in the season it was a bit cool but we got used to it. Unlike most of the places we have stayed I would definintly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean! (and affordable)”
Reviews.Author: sailingfourfun
Reviews.Content: Single dad with three boys (17, 15, & 8), visiting Disney World. Service for the price was exceptional. Large CLEAN rooms! The kitchenettes were a good size and new (still have the 'new' smell in the cupboards). The fridge was not one of those bar fridges, it comfortably fit 2 cases of pop + a dozen water + gal juice + gal milk + + +, cupboard space for all our condiments, bread, chips, popcorn, etc. The beds were a true Queen size and very comfortable. High speed internet was through WIFI, TV had most of the premium channels (espn/hbo, etc) . The pool was clean and very well maintained. There are guest use coin operated full sized washer/dryer ($1 each) The 'free continental breakfast' was exceptionally suited towards familys, with lots of variety for everyone. There were the quick grab items like donuts, muffins, and mini bagels, or toast. Cereals catering to both the kids and the adults, or if you were willing to wait 4 minutes for a fresh do-it -yourself jumbo waffel (Well worth waiting the time to cook!) There was always lots of seats/tables to sit and relax while eating your breakfast. A local grocery store was a 2 minute walk, mini golf 3 minutes. For those that rely on Walmar/Target it's a 5 min drive (one across the street from the other, both are 'super sized'). All the major parks and attractions were 10 to 20 min away. As to the Housekeeping staff, i can't say enough. Rarely do you see them, but if you needed an extra towel (or 3), or soap for the washing machine, they were there within minutes, always with a smile willing to help.

Reviews.Title: “Second year in a row for us, and we will return next year, too!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Impala guy
Reviews.Content: Decent place for you to consider, and this was our second year at this Baymont. The check in was fast and friendly and the room was neat, complete and smelled just right. Just a good, clean room. We slept just great. Breakfast and coffee were just right. Staff is trying hard to keep the place looking good and it shows. Prices are very fair. We were not there long, but were pleased with everything. Give it a try.

Reviews.Title: “excelent motel”
Reviews.Author: Zimb
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last year and this year it was just as good. The owner and his staff are really helpfull and friendly ,and the rooms are clean comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay Cheap too”
Reviews.Author: prasanachand
Reviews.Content: This is a good place to stay for a cheap cost in Orlando. This is very near to Disney World. You can drive in 5 mins. They also have several nice places to eat nearby. The rooms had a nice LCD tv and free internet. The rooms were neat but the way to get to your room looked old but the room looked very satisfying. There is no restaurant in the property. Cheap tickets can be bought near by. Service and Staff are ok allowed me a later check out. I was a happy customer

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: redlizziem
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for just one night. We got excellent value for money, in a clean comfortable room. We wanted a non-smoking room and the first one offered felt like it had been smoked in. We were swapped immediately to another room and were very satisfied with it. Didnt have any issues with the safety of the area, although the surroundings outside of the hotel's perimeter are a bit run down. This is sadly, not unusual in Florida at the moment and you shouldn't let it bother you. The hotel grounds were clean and tidy, and although we didnt use it, the pool looked inviting. Breakfast was plentiful and the dining room was kept very nice. Our only issue was the distance to Disney, but then we were not paying Disney prices. We were happy customers!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Service, & Breakfast - under present management!!!”
Reviews.Author: jerry46
Reviews.Content: We (extended family of 6 adults & 6 kids) stayed 5 nites in late November of 2010 largely based on recommendations on this site & all of us (grandparents, parents & kids) were thoroughly pleased. I had noticed the reviews for recent years were better than earlier years - apparently due to a change in management. I would guess if only reviews for the last, say 12 months (maybe more) were given by TripAdvisor this Baymont would be at/near the TOP/Best/maybe #1 in Kissimmee hotel reviews! The manager, Kamal?, who was on duty at breakfast time the first morning (&others), even helped us get Disney tickets quickly nearby & at a Local Discount price. We found exceptionally clean & well-maintained rooms & a great breakfast & top quality service at a budget price. Yes, it is 6 miles from Disney rather than 3 or 4 miles like most hotels in Kissimmee but it is much more than Well Worth the extra 5 minutes drive.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful friendly place too stay”
Reviews.Author: sophiareid
Reviews.Content: Where do we start, the welcome was so friendly, nothing was too much trouble for them, I would like to thank the owner Amanda Faizi for going out of her way to help my husband when he had run out of his medication, she is an ex pat and couldn't do more to help. The rooms were kept beautifully and so clean, and the food was excellent, we are definately booking to come back later this year and hopefully have a longer stay, we would like to say thank you to the whole staff for making our holiday even better than we expected. The staff were informative, and provided good advice and directions for our sight seeing expeditions.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel! Pleasantly surprised.”
Reviews.Author: Amies1988
Reviews.Content: We were a little wary staying in this hotel with the mixed reviews, but I must say it was a nice place at a great price. You get what you pay for- no more no less. The rooms where nice and comfy, air worked well. Didn't hear any noise. Seemed safe. I have no complaints except for its a bit of a drive to Disney World and such!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable,good value with friendly and helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: PhilrushEngland
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Baymont for a total of 10 days and were very pleased with the hotel and staff. It's unfortunate that the hotel is partly screened by a deserted resturant with its appearance of neglect, but please ignore this slight setback and you'll do yourself a favour. The comfort and cleanliness of the hotel is excellent, both inside and out; the staff friendly and helpful and even the other guests were very pleasant. I was offererd assistance two times within a minute when I was unloading our bags from the car and I'm 6'1''tall and 210 lbs so perhaps it was due to the silver hair! The well-stocked breakfast bar is spotlessly clean and well organised but may be a second waffle iron would be appreciated. Our stay co-incided with that of a group of 20/25 teenage students and teachers so we had to compete with them on a couple of occassions until we learnt that they left the hotel at at about 8.45am so we changed our routine to award ourselves an extra ten minutes in bed which resulted in us having a more relaxing start to the day. There is a good selection of resturants within easy reach of the hotel and a Wal Mart two minutes up the road! We look forward to a return visit.

Reviews.Title: “Safe, clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: tali226
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Baymont Inn Kissimmee for 2 1/2 months. The management team is really nice and helpful. They were able to provide me with many great tips about the area. The rooms are kept really clean and you can barely hear any outside noise. The pool is great, also very clean. The hotel is located right on 192, about 10 minutes away from Disney, so the location is prime. Overall, my stay here was wonderful. It felt more like I was staying in an apartment than at a hotel. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking to have a nice quiet getaway after exploring greater Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Safe, Clean, friendly, beautiful surrounds - great value!!”
Reviews.Author: Eileen357313
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this lovely hotel with my husband and four young kids. I was keen to stay in a safe and clean environment and I got exactly what I wanted! The staff were helpful in showing us around the area (as it was our first time in Florida), the generous breakfast kept the kids happy and so did the super clean pool! The rooms are very clean and generously sized with kitchenette - so i was able to prepare the kids hot meals when we was too tired to go out for dinner (a saviour at the end of a long day at the parks!) We met other guests who had being visiting this hotel every single year, for several years - and we could certainly see why! We will definitely be visiting this hotel next year, and have fallen in love with Florida, with help from Baymont management team - thank you!!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: flyer01-10
Reviews.Content: Not a bad service for a two/ three star Inn, friendly staff and atmosphere although the decor in places a little tired. Stayed for 38 nights whilst doing a course in Florida, the young lady behind the counter most evenings (melanie, I think) was very helpful. Thought after 37 nights may have got the last night for free especially as the under charge was their fault, however I guess fairly new to the business and trying to get it up and running. Overall not bad, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of Cockcroaches in your bed!!”
Reviews.Author: wardiedj
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel due to it being good value and good reviews on tripadvisor, but it was that bad we had to leave 2 days into our stay and get another hotel! First of all we got put on the bottom at the end, when the door had slights dents in to which me and my partner joked about the film 'Vacancy'.....well let me tell you it almost happened!!...we had someone about 3am try and get in oru room by trying the handle!...they then started banging the door....i shouted to them who is it, everyones in the room etc!...but they kept on banging louder and louder. In the end i had to call security to remove the person, who apparently just got the wrong room! We the next day found a cockcroach on the floor, so i flushed the little bugger!...next day we get in bed and there is one tucked up with us!...i said we would leave the next morning ASAP, but then another one appeared from behind the TV on the wall so we got straight outta there!!! To be fair they gave us our money back for the 3 days we didnt end up stopping there, but didnt do a lot about the cockcroaches or the possible break in. try to avoid at all costs, as its also set quite far back from main road!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel and great people”
Reviews.Author: stevef007
Reviews.Content: our first trip to florida and what a great hotel we choose, ideal location to all attractions and food, really friendly and helpful staff who often gave us advice and tips, great morning breakfast which was always so clean and really well stocked with cereals, waffles, toast, muffins and more, thank you, and on top of that a spurs fan.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel ... Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: shanthi_bharath
Reviews.Content: Our first trip to Florida/Orlando/Disney. Stayed at Baymont Inn Kissimmee for 5 days and we absolutely loved it. Spacious room, conveniently located to Disney and restuarants. Break fast area was extremely clean with lot of choices. Very friendly staff. Would definetely recommend this hotel to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent quality, welcoming family hotel”
Reviews.Author: guy60
Reviews.Content: We had a fantastic time at this hotel. I'm used to staying at upmarket hotels and was a little concerned about the good rates - that it might mean compromising on quality or service - but I had no reason to be concerned. The hotel really is family owned - the owners are a family and they live on site - and they and their staff create a very welcoming, friendly and safe place to stay. The rooms and the communal areas, including the pool, were always clean. We used the pool a lot and it was perfect for cooling down or, for the youngest of our party, to splash around with a new-found friend of fellow guests. The rooms were large and there was very little noise, even traffic noise as the hotel is set back from the road. Breakfast is included in the rate and it was really useful to eat before hitting the theme parks. And internet (Wifi) is free. All the theme parks, shopping and other amenities are easily accessible, with plenty of restaurants nearby. I would definitely stay at this hotel again, not just for the fair rates but for the service and quality.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for the price”
Reviews.Author: mlein
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to say that we totally enjoyed our 7 night stay at Baymont. The room was clean, the beds comfortable and we slept well at night. Though we mostly ate out, it was great having the pentry with sink, micro and fridge. The staff was always polite and helpful. The breakfast that was included in the price was sufficient and there was the added plus of fresh waffles. There were bagels, bread for toast and sometimes muffins. Syrup, jam and creme cheese were also on offer. We bought some ham with us every morning for our toast but that was mainly due to personal preferences. They had several kinds of cereal, coffee and juice. The pool area was small but clean and seldom crowded. The Mexican restaurant in front of the hotel offered good food with enormous portions at a reasonable price. What more can I say but thank you Baymont and I hope we see you again.

Reviews.Title: “I would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: Firstvisit9009
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 5 days and had no complaints at all! The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and the kitchenette was handy. It was not far from Disney, shopping and restaurants! The kids loved the pool and spent a lot of time in it making friends with other kids. The room has everything you need, free internet and free breakfast too, why pay more elsewhere for the same thing?! We had a great stay here and are planning to stay here again on our next visit! From Canada.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff, clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Karen1101
Reviews.Content: I took my son to his dorm and stayed the night at the Baymont Inn. The room is in an area with plenty of restaurants and shopping. The room was very clean and well furnished unexpectedly with fridge, microwave, small kitchen counter w/sink & cabinets. Cost was about $65 for the night. The staff was more than welcoming and helpful. Pool area looked nice and clean too. Free breakfast included hot waffles too. Can't say enough good things about this place.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful time we had”
Reviews.Author: bluecowdog
Reviews.Content: This hotel was listed as one of the host hotels for our annual Dog show we have in Kissimmee. They let us check in early, room was bright and clean. Pool was wonderful. Did not get to try breakfast as we had to leave before it was served each morning. Pet friendly. The staff was great. This hotel is on my list to stay again while in Kissimmee. Had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place - Top Service, Great Staff! Recommended Highly!”
Reviews.Author: terry2010Berlin
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time staying in the Baymont Inn & Suites and enjoying the hotel's pool and the fitness and other facilities. Rooms were very comfortable and service was just great. Staff made us feel very welcome and was very helpful with all concerns we had. Internet access was easy and fast. Price was small for all the comfort and the super service. I highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Stayed before,Stayed again,and would use again!”
Reviews.Author: SpeedyStu
Reviews.Content: Family run hotel,recently changed hands,excellent super sparkly pool,clean rooms with safe,microwave and fridge(at no additional charge).set back of the road,slightly difficult to find 200 yds past marker 15 behind a mexican restaurant,but worth the effort!.Excellent continental style breakfast gets the day of to a good start. served 7am to 10am.Beds comfy and sheets clean.Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “If you read 1 review, read this, Superb all around & excellent Value!”
Reviews.Author: daburmawolf
Reviews.Content: I am relocating to Orlando with a large local company. Being on company relo program I had many choices and tried and checked out several hotels, extended stay places, ect. By far Baymont offered the best value. I have been painstakenly looking to buy a home but haven't found one yet and am going on comfortably staying at the Baymont going on 5 months (at time of writing). It is very family friendly, safe, centrally located and clean. Also, it has many free services: Fresh, hot Belgian waffles for breakfast, internet, fridge, microwave, mini-kitchen... Friendly, very helpful, and quite amusingly, entertaining front desk staff working hard for their money (one night they brought me toliet paper and light bulb at 3am)! Kamal, the owner, will go out of his way to make you feel welcomed and comfortable. He even invited me to a fabulous dinner feast at his home with him and his family. My daughters really loved the pool and my wife loved all the great shopping near by. I have reccomended to my relatives to stay here also when they come. Two thumbs up. I wouldn't be staying this long if not. Ron (the Groundhog day guy)

Reviews.Title: “Photos on website really need updating”
Reviews.Author: wenbcalm
Reviews.Content: Rates are fantastic. Not very clean and if you didn't leave a note with the tip daily they wouldn't replenish toilet paper, cups or towels. 4 people in a room need more than a couple of towels. Our reservation was made 3 months in advance requesting a ground floor room and it wasn't granted. Pool area very clean but the rooms are very dated and in shabby condition.

Reviews.Title: “Very good location and clean. The service...”
Reviews.Author: leelah6
Reviews.Content: Very good location and clean. The service is excellent. Definitely coming back!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful ambience, marvellous service - would recommend highly”
Reviews.Author: gregorydvd
Reviews.Content: We spent a couple of days at the Baymont Inn Kissimmee and had a really wonderful time. We were treated like special friends by the staff and the general service and offer was worth more than what we paid for. Relaxing atmosphere, wonderful facilities and friendly service. Food was great and I could go on for ever ... keep up the good standards guys and I'll be back soon again!

Reviews.Title: “i wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone”
Reviews.Author: princessshannon2010
Reviews.Content: this hotel is the worst hotel i have ever stayed at. the rooms where not cleaned and full of dead fly's and other insects inside the room and the rooms was not clean at all before we checked in. We found found bugs in the bed and reported it to reception and they was not very helpful or freindly. But they did eventually moved us to another room but that was still the same. i was really disapointed with this hotel.......

Reviews.Title: “great spot”
Reviews.Author: queenie1000
Reviews.Content: Nice, large, clean rooms. You can aprk in front of the door. Breakfast is good even with warm wafels. Pool is good to cool off after a warm day and they even provide towels at the pool.

Reviews.Title: “My favourite place in Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: anam8545
Reviews.Content: How can you not like this place - clean, safe, friendly. I see them all the staff as friends now. the owners take care of anything I need, its like staying with a family, you don't get that personal touch in any other place. I needed directions, the owner gave me them. My friends and I were at an event in Kissimmee, they let us have a late breakfast, Me and my friends will be staying here again regularly. The owners are great and I see changes and improvements every time. Its such a shame so many people just moan, but actually, if you have problem, it gets sorted. well done everyone and thanks guys for making it so special.

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better”
Reviews.Author: CharleyBlue
Reviews.Content: Was in Kissimmee for a dog sporting event and our group had blocks of rooms reserved here. Not a lot of grassy area for dogs to do their business. Area where motel is located was kind of run down - out of business restaurants, etc. Sat back from the road and was hard to spot. Older hotel in need of renovations and updating. Rooms did have microwave and mini-refrigerator, so that was a plus. Wi-fi worked fine.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel with lowe price tag.”
Reviews.Author: Crabfin
Reviews.Content: Such a wonderful experience with my family. After a long journey from UK,,we were expecting relaxation and good service, Thanks, We were taken such good care at this hotel. It is close to the resorts and going out was no problem. Breakfast was nice so that we were ready for the day. The owner and the family stays at the hotel so any minor complaint was immediatly taken care of. I would reccomend all to make this hotel "Choice No. 1" for Florida.

Reviews.Title: “2.5 star hotel, but if for the price can't be beat”
Reviews.Author: ilovemarriottrewards
Reviews.Content: Pros - Free Shuttle to Disney, microwave/fridge/extra sink in room, great value, less than 10 minute shuttle ride to Disney, large pool. Cons - Bathroom had some blemishes, all rooms are outside, breakfast buffet is only muffins/donuts/waffles, no fruit. I'm used to staying in Courtyards, and this is definitely a step below, but for the price. I can't complain! I wouldn't want to pay more than $40/night, but if you get it less than it, it's a great deal! Absolutely no complaints for the price. If I paid $75 a night, then I would complain, but I paid $40.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: bear017
Reviews.Content: We got stranded here due to the volcano and the staff could not do enough to try to help us, the spacious rooms are perfect for families visiting the parks, parking superb, plenty of places nearby to eat and shop. Pool, Gym and laundry facilities came in very useful. The Tea and coffee facilities in the room is a nice touch. If you are going to Orlando this is the place to stay, close to International Drive, central to everything. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great service, great value”
Reviews.Author: iang666
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for one week in April whilst on a visit to disney and found it to be an ideal choice with regard to location and cost. The rooms are clean and well furnished and it would seem that the hotel has recently had upgrades and improvements made to it as all appeared to be well maintained. The staff are all very friendly and made us feel extremely welcome. I would certainly recommend this hotel for those who want a clean, safe base at a reasonable cost. i would use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great choice for the money!”
Reviews.Author: DutchyCan
Reviews.Content: Stayed here a few years ago when it was still called AmeriHost Inn. At that time, I think, it had a higher rating on TripAdvisor. I just know I booked online and found it to be a great deal. Just a bit hidden behind the Mexican Restaurant, so watch carefully when you drive there and take the correct exit. The rooms are spaceous, the airco worked well and there are two beds, so you could fit 4 people if needed. When we went (in May 2007) the rooms were just newly decorated and everything was clean. It felt a bit like a new hotel. The rate was really good (even though the dollar was higher back then) and even though it is not a fancy or 5 star hotel, I have been in 4 star hotels where I had a lesser experience. For a couple who wanted to be in the Orlando area without spending too much money on a hotel (we wanted to sleep there, not use it as a resort) it exceeded our expectations and I was happy with the good reviews in 2007. When in the area, I would give it another try!

Reviews.Title: “Old building. Area not safest.”
Reviews.Author: zorrygp
Reviews.Content: Located close to a restaurant/bar on one side and night club behind the motel. Exterior corridors made us feel unsafe in that neighborhood. Police arrived to anser a call placed from someone at the night club. The building was old. Bathroom dirty. My husband found dead bugs in his sheets and hairs in bathroom. The bathtub was dirty, covered in a film of filth. The room smelled really bad, everytime we returned to the room. Breakfast was a few slices of bread, cheesecream, jelly and plain bagels, few choices for cereal and milk. Orage juice was diluted so badly, we figured out it was OJ just based on its color. The coffee wasn't good either. I have stayed at many different categories hotels thoughot the US - Mariott, Hilton, Sheraton, but also, Microtel, Super 8, etc. This was a poor choice.

Reviews.Title: “False advertising”
Reviews.Author: dixiedogCanada
Reviews.Content: I had booked a two week stay a few months ago. I had requested, and got confirmation, that I was booked into a room with two Queen sized beds. Boy, I was I ever surprised when I got there, and went to our room. Instead of two queen beds, there was two double beds. Asked front desk about the bed size. There answer was, They are standard queen size beds, but not the same size that you have at your house. The window in the motel was so old, that you could hardly see out of it.. We went for a walk after we booked in. Found a Howard Johnson just down the road wit a king size bed and we also saved two hundred dollarsto boot. Went back to the Baymont and asked for our money back and left. When I told the people at Howard Johnson about the beds size fiasco, they laugh and explained that the standard beds that they have, are four inches bigger than a double, and six inches narrower than a queen bed. Wouldn't reccomend this motel to anybody...not even my enemies,,,,The only positive side of this, was, they did refund our money without any problems.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay at The Baymont Inn & Suites Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: NYToTampaGirl
Reviews.Content: Just returned from an overnight stay with my daughter's High School softball team. The hotel is one of the nicer hotels in the area. The grounds are nicely kept and parking was abundant. The rooms were very clean. I tend to obsess about the cleanliness of a hotel room so when I say it was very clean, it was. The price was great as well. I didn't have the continental breakfast so I can't comment on it. Overall, we had a great stay. Hopefully next year we will return to the Baymont Inn & Suites.

Reviews.Title: “Spring break”
Reviews.Author: barbiwils311
Reviews.Content: My family had 2 "jacuzzi" rooms. They were simply a whirlpool tub, so it was not what I expected. HOWEVER.... the room was so clean, nice bedspreads, cleaned every day> had a safe. We were able to get our rooms one on top of the other, the jacuzzi suites are corner rooms only. I was so pleasantly suprised. the staff was nice. The only real drawback was you cannot take the breakfast to your room and the breakfast room is not too big> it had about 10 tables. But the staff was out at all times refilling the food, coffee, fruit, etc. They paid alot of attention to it right up until everyone left at about 10:15 -10:30. We got there earlier than expected and they let us have the one room that was ready about 11:00 a.m. we needed to clean up after having a couple of sick kids in the car on the way. They were awesome and very great for the value. will definitely go back on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Hard to find the first time......................”
Reviews.Author: Impala guy
Reviews.Content: but a decent place. As others have said it lacks most services, but we slept great and it was off to the airport for us. It is neat and clean and reasonably priced. This seems to be an old Holiday Inn (vintage 1973 or so) and the owners are trying to run a decent business and have put lots of $$$$ trying to renew stuff. The breakfast is really, really, really basic==so don't expect a whole lot there. There seemed to be a lot of older customers that were probably attracted by the good prices. The computer in the lobby charged a fee, but the nice lady at the front desk ran our boarding passes for us for free. Nice touch. Signage is very basic so it is easy to miss.
