Its just past the Wal Mart. We drove past it twice before we saw it.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great price, clean rooms but lacks service.”
Reviews.Author: perry2005
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in a great location, close to Orlando Airport, Universal Studios, Disney etc... The room was clean and we got the room for a great price $292 for 9 nights, which included tax/fees etc. We booked online direct with Baymont Inn. We were visiting the area to watch my daughter play college softball, so this was not a "real" vacation, so I did not mind roughing it a bit. The room had a small kitchenette which consisted of frige, microwave, coffee pot and cabinets which was nice. The hotel had a nice pool area off the parking lot. My only complaints would be that the service was definitely lacking, but we did not complain because we could not expect much for what we paid. Some examples of lack of service were: I had to ask and get from the front desk toilet paper twice. The maids left the roll with about 1/4 of the roll remaining without leaving an extra roll. One day the maids left us no towels, so I had to ask one of the maids I saw on another floor for towels. They did not replenish the paper cups, condiments or coffee/tea for the coffee maker. Also, the free continental breakfast was definitely lacking. We got there by 8 am and most items were out . The variety of food was not great - very little fruit and no yogart, but again we did not complain due to the price. We simply bought breakfast food for the room and occasionally grabbed a bowl of cereal, coffee and juice at the breakfast room. Also, the hotel was pretty busy and filled with a variety of kids teams, so at times it was very loud and kept us awake. If you are on a tight budget and don't care about service, I would recommend this hotel. If you expect service without asking, then I would stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Painfully Average”
Reviews.Author: pageezer
Reviews.Content: Here are some insights about this property. The room was clean but had a peculiar odor. The breakfast area met minimum standards. The pool is small, well maintained and located in the middle of a large parking lot. The property is accessed by a bumpy lane and is behind a Mexican Resturant that looks shabby. The elevator floor was filthy. The second day here housekeeping failed to provide glasses soap and shampoo. I am not happy I stayed here and would only recommend it if you are on an extremely tight budget

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: KidstoFrance
Reviews.Content: I'm giving the Baymont a five star rating but it is not a five star hotel. That being said, it was an excellent value. It is only a 15 - 20 minute drive from Universal Studios, is very inexpensive, is clean, comfortable, has attentive staff, a nice continental breakfast included, and overall was a terrific experience for us.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for the price”
Reviews.Author: mphrpm
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 4 nights. Room was clean and tidy. Having a fridge and microwave along with coffee pot was a plus. Could hear some noise outside but not loud enough to keep you awake. Breakfast was ok, not much but still was enough to get you through the morning. Location was great and close to everything. Will stay again..

Reviews.Title: “Wow, what a deal”
Reviews.Author: Flyingeagle777
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best Hotels I have ever stayed in. The rooms a roomy, clean and comfortable. The staff is friendly and helpful. The value is exceptional. It is a little far away from the main tourist attractions in Kissimmee, but the upside to this is its a lot quieter. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: snowy
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times over the past couple of years and find the hotel to be a pleasant place to stay during a visit to Kissimmee. The rooms are clean and of reasonable size with nice comfortable beds. The breakfast is quite good considering the price of accomodation. The hotel is set back 100 yards from the 192 near mile marker 15 close to Hoagland Blvd. The front desk staff are very friendly and always willing to assist with any problems. In particular, Melissa was able to remember us from our previous visit a year ago and was very helpful once again. For anyone wanting accomodation at a reasonable cost this hotel should meet your needs. Thanks Baymont Inn, Hope to see you all again next Year. David & Susan

Reviews.Title: “good,clean affordable accommodation.”
Reviews.Author: Zimb
Reviews.Content: The young lady on the desk was friendly and helpfull.The room was very clean and comfortable.The only problem was that there was no cups to use with the coffee percolator.Would use again.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: richgibb
Reviews.Content: If you don't mind a dirty room in a run down neighborhood with abandoned, boarded up buildings all around you then this is your hotel. The room next to us had 4 or 5 guys that I would describe as "crack heads" going in and out and am pretty sure they were smoking said narcotic during the 10 minutes we were there. I packed up the kids and went to the nearest Hampton Inn.

Reviews.Title: “CLEAN ROOM GREAT SERVICES”
Reviews.Author: dadyrtb
Reviews.Content: the services at the reception desk and breakfast are great. Room is clean. good place to stay for the price. need more toaster for breakfast so that the line can be shorten. Vacant buildings in front could be eye sore for 1st time comer. Hotel look great

Reviews.Title: “The Place to Stay Near Disney”
Reviews.Author: HappyFamily1209
Reviews.Content: When you enter the hotel, you immediately are hit with the beauty and elegance of the lobby. We were given the utmost kindness and respect by all of the people that worked at the hotel and Yudi was especially helpful in helping us check out. The room was elegant and comfortable and had everything we could ask for in it. It was very close to where we were going and we were very happy to be there. We would definitely stay there again when in town.

Reviews.Title: “Great price - clean room - good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: shadowva
Reviews.Content: We have stayed several times and always found the rooms clean and the staff courteous and the price fantastic - we usually stay here our first and last nights of our Disney trips - the rooms are large, have fridge, microwave and free wifi - they also offer free breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Almost perfect. Recommended for all that want value and quality.”
Reviews.Author: Grayman77
Reviews.Content: I had to call the hotel with questions twice and both times received a quick response. Check in time is 3pm, but we arrived at 10pm and had no problems checking in. The room was ready and waiting. The desk clerk, James, was very pleasant and informative about the hotel and the local attractions, even though this was the end of his shift. The room was spacious, everything worked and was very clean. The room had a 27 inch widescreen lcd tv that got great reception and worked fine. A few too many sports and news channels for my taste, but enough of the basic cable and regular chanels were present, such as TNT, TBS, USA and one premium cable channel, HBO. There was a clean and easy to use coffee machine, microwave, small fridge and hair dryer. The queen size beds were comfortable and I'm 6 feet tall and have a Tempurpedic at home. The pillows were typical hotel pillows, but we doubled up so they were comfortable enough for me. We selected the jacuzzi room and do not recommend the jacuzzi for anyone other than a solo small adult or a pair of young kids. It worked fine, but was not much bigger than a regular bathtub. I could only sit in it. The hotel is located behind a Mexican Food restaurant off of the 192. Other reviewers found it difficult to see behind the restaurant, but we found that looking for the only restaurant with a bright red "Mexican food" sign was easier to find that one of many hotels in the area. Once you see the restaurant, just look up and the hotel towers over it behind it. Easy access and plenty of parking. There was a pool, gym, washer and dryer, and arcade room that we did not use, but looked good. The ice machine was broken on our floor, but there is one on every floor by the elevator, so a very short ride down and we had ice. The I4 and Turnpike are very close which gave us easy access to everywhere that we wanted to go. we hope to stay at this hotel again and recommend it to all.

Reviews.Title: “In this hotel the ratio beetween the quality offered and price paid is good”
Reviews.Author: pparla01
Reviews.Content: I'm quite satisfied by the service received by the Hotel, during my stay of the 7th of October 2009 Paolo Parlagreco

Reviews.Title: “The service there was really good.”
Reviews.Author: CeasarGomez
Reviews.Content: I had a problem with the icebox and an employee named Yudi, I think it was, help me out and fix the icebox. Also, I needed assistance for directions for various locations and Kim was able to assist me, which really satisfied me !

Reviews.Title: “Call to determine condition!!”
Reviews.Author: MSDISNEYMOM
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at the hotel for our 1 night stay, it was in a run-down part of town and did not look clean nor safe. The columns at the front of the hotel by the office had caution tape wrapped around them and it did not look like for construction or renovation. I did not even stop to go in because I did not feel safe.

Reviews.Title: “COMFORTABLE BEDS BUT EVERYTHING ELSE VERY DIRTY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kpaza
Reviews.Content: My family and i decided to stay in a modest hotel in orlando only because we really would not be there alot. The staff was helpfull but not a whole lot. The day we arrived we called front desk because our safety box was not working and they said they would be there tomorrow. well they ended up fixing it 2 day later. The bath tub of our bathroom was dirty it was black and grimmy. We let front desk know, we left house keeping know but it was still dirty. luckyly we were able to shower our relatives room. we asked to be traded to a diffrent room and well they said no. My sister was walking around the room with her sock S and they were black from all the dirt. one morning while we were eating their nasty continental breakfast we saw an employee wiping the sweat off her forehead and then touched all the clean plates. the beds were comfy and the sheets were clean but besides that everything else made me never want to Stay there. the location was also good there were a lot of resturants around. Also behind the hotel there was a bowling alley and well that added a lot of noise, car, drunk people, kids with loud music.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant and gracious”
Reviews.Author: dm_hardy
Reviews.Content: We found this inn to be a very good choice for us. The staff was very helpful always, very pleasant and accommodating. The room was comfortable and well-appointed. This inn is also close to any number of restaurants, and those that we chose were excellent values. And not a bad access to WDW.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay at Baymont was GREAT!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: dluv2trvl
Reviews.Content: We arrived at Baymont on April 13 stayed until the 20th of apr. We had 3 teenagers in our group. they liked the pool ,arcade room. we were in a standard room, but we asked about an upgrade of our room and they put us in a room much bigger and w/ jauzzi. The maid service was great . Front desk personal was very friendly and helpful. the continental breakfast was very good. we bought some breakfast food to put into micro to go with other items that were provided and it turned out very good and MUCH CHEAPER than going out every morning. we never had a problem w/ noise outside the rooms. the location was not very hard to find. marker 15 and you are there. Walmart is about 3 blks away. There is a oriental seafood buffet about 3/4 mi east .of baymont and it is very good.Very good selection of entrees. and the service is good. CICI PIZZA BUFFET IS A MUST TRY!!!!!!!!!!! Get a coupon from baymont for 10% discount of total bill ALWAYS A LINE FOR THE CINNAMON ROLLS (AWSOME). We had a very good vacation stay at baymont kissimmee. we will definately be back... thanx baymont!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: mac17Delaware
Reviews.Content: My yearly trip to Fl. for 2 weeks of bass fishing was greatly enjoyed thanks to the staff at this Baymont. They were very helpful in making sure we had the right rooms and parking spaces to acommadate our bass boats.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for budget watchers”
Reviews.Author: diznan
Reviews.Content: Just returned home from 8 nights at this hotel. Rooms were clean, service was very nice. Loved having the mini frig, microwave and coffee pot. There was also a safe in the room at no extra cost to use! The rooms are very quiet, didn't hear any noise from the other rooms. Plenty of parking. Maid service was very efficient.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel & value”
Reviews.Author: lrg67
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Baymont Inn in Kissimmee, Florida for fourteen nights, Feb. 25 - March 11 2009. It was a very restful, pleasant place to stay & close to many of the tourist attractions. We traveled with our pet, so it was important to find a hotel which accepted dogs. We have stayed here before & definetly will stay here again. The price was great & the breakfast included each morning was excellent. Jackson, Michigan

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay at the Baymont Inn”
Reviews.Author: schwartz26
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful 7 night stay at the Baynont Inn, Kissimmee! If you are looking for 4-5 star hotel then this is not the place for you. But if you are looking for a CLEAN, QUIET and comfortable room then this is the place for you! The rooms at the Baymont are Very quiet, although the hotel was packed, we never heard a sound from rooms next to us or from outside. The rooms were clean, beds comfortable. You get a very clean refridgerator and microwave, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, we got new soaps and small bottles of shampoo and conditioner daily and free WI Fi in the room. The pool was clean and nice. The staff was very friendly and everyone always had a hello and smile. It can be a little hard to find as others have mentioned as it is off the road just a bit, but as others have said keep an eye out for a mexican resturaunt. The hotel is just a little ways past Medeval Times, so once you pass that, keep your eyes open for it. I hope this hotel continues with the great service and nice rooms! Will stay there everytime we visit, 2-3 times a year!

Reviews.Title: “Don't leave anything of value in your room!”
Reviews.Author: BABYRN27
Reviews.Content: I felt that the area the hotel is located in seemed dangerous from people drag racing in the parking lot to police banging on other hotel room doors in the middle of the night. All of this didn't really bother me too much but to make it worse there was to be a "shuttle that ran to the Disneyworld theme parks every 30 minutes" but it was the public transportation bus which stopped at every bus stop all the way to Disney and we had to walk over a block to even find the bus stop which no one seemed to know where it was. All of this would have been just fine with me because I don't usually let things bother me but to top it all off after I left as I was looking through my baggage I came to realize that my iPod and noise canceling headphones had been taken from my baggage during my stay and therefore I will never be returning to this hotel because I don't want to stay somewhere that I don't even feel I can trust the employees. I hope this helps anyone actually trying to decide if this would be a good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Above Average for The Area”
Reviews.Author: GARoxy04
Reviews.Content: We've been visiting Kissimmee for over 10 years and this is the best bang for your buck! We booked the last 3 nights in Feb 2009 on the Baymont website for $32 per night with no hidden fees! Pros: Very Nice at the Desk! Quick check-in/check-out (Wauneta was great) Clean Good size room, Fridge & Micro, Good Internet service (Free) , Didn't do the Breakfast or the pool but both looked good. Con's The vacant dilapidated restaurant out front makes this property look kind of sketchy,(I'm sure someone will buy and revamp it soon) Bed's in our room were kind of tired, but did see some new one's being installed while we were there. Entering and exiting the motel can be kind of tricky as your on the East bound side of the roadway and for the most part everything is west of there so you have to go up about a 1/4 mile to turn around. But the value out ways the inconvenience by far!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best experience in 20 years.”
Reviews.Author: Cart1
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to the area for 20 years. The past motels that we stayed at were higher priced and with lesser quality. This year the budget was a little tighter so we looked for a bargain. This was by far the best place and much better pricing and also was much quieter, the room was clean and the people at the front desk were friendly and accommodating. Also the mini fridge and microwave didn't cost extra as the others did. We will return next year.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: ButtonsLancasterPA
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two weeks, found the accommodations to be clean, comfortable and spacious. The Staff was very friendly and helpful. We appreciated the microwave, fridge, extra sink. A good healthy breakfast was provided including fresh fruit. Location is convenient to many areas including tourist sites, grocery and outlet shopping. The motel is set back from the highway so look for a Mexican Restaurant sign in front as a guide as well as highway marker 15 if you are driving on 192 east, right side of the highway.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Choice!”
Reviews.Author: chiqui73
Reviews.Content: The location is great, 2 blocks from walmart (open 24 hours), central from Disney and Universal Parks. Breakfast is included and you have different choices, fruits, cereals, oatmeal, bread, waffles, coffee, juice. Rooms clean and beds comftables

Reviews.Title: “More than expected”
Reviews.Author: shimonin
Reviews.Content: Staff were very friendly and helpful. The continental breakfast was generous.Prices were reasonable.Rooms were very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for a couple of nights in January 2009. This is a nice hotel, very clean and very convenient. The room has a mini-fridge and a microwave, which is nice. Wireless Internet access is provided in the room for free. The continental breakfast offers a very good selection and it is available from 7h00 to 10h00. But the pool is very odd. It is small and located right in the middle of the parking lot! If you want to go to there you will also have to be very vigilant to find the place since it is located far from the main road (192) and the sign near the street is very small. The best way to find it is to look for a Mexican Restaurant located on the south side of the 192 between marker 15 and 16 (near the 15). The Baymont is right behind this Mexican Grill. I would definitely recommend this hotel even if there were other hotels in the area much closer to the attraction like Disney because it is cheap, clean and well maintained. The extra six or seven minutes that you will have to drive are a good investment.

Reviews.Title: “loving kissimee”
Reviews.Author: vikki-gc
Reviews.Content: we stayed at baymont, as our house in davenport was rented out when we decided to visit florida for our holiday.. the location of the baymont, for us, was perfect. we could even walk to resturants/attractions which we had not been able to do until now. we were surrounded by shops galore, eating places and mini tourist attractions, the best been a huge bowling alley at the rear of the hotel, which we obtained a decent number of discount vouchers, making our trips bowling even more enjoyable :) the room was basic but cleanish, we had clean towels each day, complimentary toiletries, the beds were made daily, all our rubbish taken away. the dust did build up after two weeks and i found myself just running a wet cloth over certain areas. we had a single fold up bed delivered to the room. we had a room with a spa bath and solarimum light, which was an extra luxury for us. the complimentary breakfast was ample even though we werent able to get a seat in the dining room, we took the food to our room (which was not allowed) everyone was doing it, but i was verbally attacked one day for doing this and when i stated that my children were still sleeping i was asked 'are your children handicapped?'!. the only staff that could speak any fluent english were the reception staff. we found all other staff to be standish and curt (basically because they hadnt a clue what was going on). free coffee was able 24 hours, my husband made use of this and i didnt hear him complain about the quality. we had a complimentary paper each day for the first week , but none on the second week (we werent too sure if that was because i was late getting it and they had run out or there just wasnt any). the laundry facilties were great, reception changed my dollar notes and i found the machines to be adequate. i managed to wash for two weeks for 10 dollars. we had free internet in the room, which was a god send having taken our two youngest teenagers on this trip. when access went off, we obtained the help line number and were easily talked through the procedure to reset the internet. the pool wasnt heated, and filled with debris and leaves. i didnt feel comfortable lying by the pool, been overlooked by quite a few rooms. the car park, we noticed, became very full at night and if we went out at night, the spaces by our room were very limited, but there were loads of parking at the rear of the hotel. if we were travelling on our own, and had to use the baymont again, then we would be quite happy to do so. but if youre travelling with moody teenagers who definitely need some space at the end of the day, dont go to this type of motel :)

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Again”
Reviews.Author: JimGrandRapidsMI
Reviews.Content: We have now returned home after spending the New Year at the Baymont. Much to our surprise, our kids gave us this trip to see the Capital One Bowl and made all the arrangements as a Christmas gift. The rooms were clean, the food was better than expected, the people made you feel at home. We sat at the pool several times as the temp got to 80 most days. The rooms had a micro and refrig, both needed and used, safes in the room made you feel secure. The maids, although they spoke no English, were willing to find out your desires and tried to please us in every way possible. We are planning to return to the area from over 1200 miles away in about a month and are planning on spending two weeks at the Baymont, as we would not miss the opportunity to again receive the great hospitality we received on this trip. Keep up the good work. Personal communication is what we were looking for. We got it HERE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and great rate”
Reviews.Author: td397
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great rate and a great room. For Kissimmee budget hotels along the Hwy 192 hotel/entertainment strip - this is really a nice motel. Cute tropical pool area, well lite property, sits back from the highway and front desk was very nice! Wireless was excellent too. Families and singles - great night stay.

Reviews.Title: “loved the room”
Reviews.Author: mbwest
Reviews.Content: baymont inn kissimmee orlando 21-12-2008 we loved the rooms the best is the size on the beds and you can make some koffe and ther is frezzenger so you can have some cold drinks. other things ve liked was the location easy to find tema parks and easy to go were els you will go. the personal are also very god service and do all they can for help.
